```{r}
# check if there are any draws or both wins in a game
bResults <- matches_data$bResult
rResults <- matches_data$rResult
bResultsLength <- length(bResults)
rResultsLength <- length(rResults)


paste("Number of blue results: ", bResultsLength)
paste("Number of red results: ", rResultsLength)
```
